Html:
Hi, 

i am trying to build a wcf service that will get the x/y of a user 

the service will also have some reference tables that it will need to work with 

one of them will contain all business around an area. 

i have been able to pool up the reference data with a polling interval, but when i try to build a stream of geographic polygon, i get an error saying that that data type is not supported. 

can you by any chance, provide a demo for working with spatio temporal referance data and wcf input.

 

thanks in advance
